text: Milton Bradley Company is an American company that makes toys and board games. It was formed by Milton Bradley in 1860 in Springfield, Massachusetts.Jill Lepore, The Mansion of Happiness: A History of Life and Death (New York: Vintage Books, 2013), p. xv The Milton Bradley company was taken over by Hasbro in 1984. It is still part of Hasbro today. Milton Bradley has made board games like Battleship, Connect Four, Jenga, and Yahtzee. == References == Category:1860 establishments in the United States Category:Board games Category:Companies based in Massachusetts Category:Springfield, Massachusetts Category:19th-century establishments in Massachusetts
